casebody.data:
MERRILL LYNCH, PIERCE, FENNER & SMITH, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
Greg MANNING, et al. No. 14-1132. Supreme Court of the United States June 30, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for a writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit granted.
